meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the wind blew blowiest I have ever seen!
meanings.sent2: The hurricane blew blowiest last year.
meanings.sent3: The birthday candles were blown blowiest by the excited child.
meanings.sent4: The whistle blew blowiest at the end of the game.
meanings.sent5: The strong gust of wind blew blowiest through the open window.

meanings.sent1: Today is windier, but yesterday was blowier than today.
meanings.sent2: The blowiest day of the week was Thursday.
meanings.sent3: The kite flew highest on the blowiest day.
meanings.sent4: The blowiest balloon popped first in the strong wind.
meanings.sent5: The blowiest storm of the season caused a lot of damage.
